content:
NodeLabelEditEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the BeforeLabelEdit and AfterLabelEdit events of a TreeView control.

In this Article

public delegate void NodeLabelEditEventHandler(object sender, NodeLabelEditEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
NodeLabelEditEventHandler

Remarks

When you create a NodeLabelEditEventArgs delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. For more information about event handler delegates, see Events.
